name: Alisha Chinai
description: '''Alisha Chinai''' (born 18 March 1965) is an Indian pop singer known for her [[Indi-pop]] albums as well as [[Music of Bollywood|playback singing]] in [[Hindi cinema]]. She began her singing career with the album ''Jadoo'' in 1985, and by the 1990s she had become known as the 'Queen of [[Indipop]]'. Her best known songs were with producers [[Anu Malik]] and [[Biddu]] during the 1990s. Her best known song is ''[[Made in India (album)|Made in India]]''.
